name: Greek Feta Dip
description: A refreshing dip with lots of flavour - great served with pita crisps.

ingredients.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix or Za'atar Seasoning

preparation: Spread on a plate and top with tomato, cucumber and red onion.
Drizzle lightly with olive oil and coarsely grind Black Pepper overtop, if desired.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Za’atar Seasoning
summary: Bring home restaurant-style Middle Eastern flavours with this multi-purpose blend designed to kick mealtime boredom to the curb!
